article_title: New York City Mitigates Rules, Fines For Businesses
article_text:
The New York City agency responsible for enforcing consumer-protection laws will unveil a package of changes Wednesday aimed at reducing fines on small businesses by more than a third during the next year, officials said.

The nearly two dozen changes are part of a multiagency effort to fulfill a campaign pledge by Mayor Bill de Blasio to reduce the fines after complaints that former Mayor Michael Bloomberg's office targeted small...
